questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Drezel, who is located underground near Paterdomus. (Chat 2•✓•4•1)
additionalStepInformation: The entrance is north from the temple's door.The food he gives you will be dropped if you don't.
Make sure you have prayer points before starting.

questSteps.stepDescription: Exit into Morytania and travel south to a fence.
Look along the fence for a gate and go through it.

Go South until a round island is found with a grotto tree.
Jump across the broken bridge and onto the island.
Search the bench nearby to get the mirror
Search the grotto tree to find his journal.
Equip a ghostspeak amulet and talk to Filliman Tarlock. (Chat 2•2•4)
Head back to Drezel.
Have Drezel bless you. After he blesses you, you have the option to be teleported back to Filliman. If you have lost Wolfbane: (Chat 2•1) If you have Wolfbane in your bank or inventory: (Chat 1)
Stand next to a rotting log in the swamp and Cast the druidic spell (in your inventory).
Take the Mort myre fungus mushroom from the log and show it to Filliman.
By the grotto use the following items in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: Use the mushroom on the western, yellow stone.
Use the used spell card on the eastern, grey stone.
Stand on top of the southern, orange stone.

questSteps.stepDescription: Tell Filliman the puzzle is solved. (Chat 3)
Go in the tree and search the grotto.
Talk to the Nature Spirit and he will ask you for a silver sickle.
Obtain a silver sickle via purchasing it from the Grand Exchange or crafting one yourself which is outlined in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: Obtain a sickle mould from a Crafting shop or the Grand Exchange. You may add it to the tool belt.
Smelt at a furnace with a silver bar.
Select "silver bar" under "Casting Metals & Glass" section on the interface
Then select the "silver sickle" option in the "Silver Casting" section.

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to Drezel at Paterdomus and talk to him to teleport you back to the grotto again.
Enter the grotto tree, and talk to the Nature Spirit with a silver sickle in your inventory.
Head out to the swamp and stand next to any rotting log.
Right-click the sickle and click Bloom, and collect the fungus (do this 3 times). You must have prayer points to do this.
Click Fill on the druid pouch to add the fungus into it.
additionalStepInformation: It is recommend getting six fungus and filling the pouch as the Ghasts can rot the contents of the druid pouch.

questSteps.stepDescription: Click Invoke on a swamp ghast, and then kill it with any weapon. (do this 3 times)
Once complete, return to the Nature Spirit.
Quest complete!
